title: Normaâ€™s Quick Plum Pudding
abstract:
We sometimes appeal to our readers to send in their favourite recipes and very pleased when we get a response.
One of our regular and faithful subscribers, to the Waranga News, Norma Morgan of Highton, has sent in a couple of her quick and easy ones. Thanks, Norma!
method: Bring the cup of milk and 1 tbspn butter to the boil.
Cool and stir in dry ingredients well.
Put in a greased basin and cover with foil, steam for two hours.
